Desc.entry: Dance classes taught by IDTA qualified teachers. Performs in a bi-annual show.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues 5.30-6.15pm (freestyle and street dance for children aged 5 years and over), 6.15-7pm (rock'n'roll for children aged 5 years and over), 7-7.45pm (freestyle and street dance for children and young people aged 12 years and over); Wed 5.30-6.15pm (musical theatre class for children aged 5-11 years), 6.15-7pm (musical theatre class for children and young people aged 12 years and over), 7-8pm (adult street dance and exercise); Thurs 5.15-6pm (theatre dance for children and young people aged 10 years and over), 6-6.45pm (beginners tap class for young people aged 10 years and over), 6.45-7.30pm (theatre dance for young people aged 13 years and over); Fri 6.30-7.15pm (freestyle and street dance for young people aged 12 years and over); Sat 9.30-10.15am (tots ballet and tap for children aged 2-5 years), 10.15-11am (preparatory ballet and tap for children aged 6-8 years), 11-11.45pm (primary ballet and tap for childen aged 9 years and over), 12.30-1.15pm (freestyle and street-dance for children aged 5-11 years).
